title: Recreational Areas, Anthea Spa, Eyeware at The Vantage
posting_body: ['Life at The Vantage is like nothing else in northeastern Ohio!', 'Our resort-like apartment community is ideally located a short drive from downtown Cleveland and just off I-271, making it getting around the Cleveland area easy.', 'Convenience is key at The Vantage, with Beachwood Place shopping mall located directly across the street and the Cleveland Clinic just minutes away.', 'Property Amenities:', 'The Hair Loft', 'Gated Community with Controlled Access', 'Sauna and Whirlpool Spa', 'Swerve Grille', 'Pilates Studio', 'Heated Garages', 'Public Transportation Available', 'Indoor and Outdoor Pool', 'Recreational Areas', 'Eyeware at The Vantage', 'Heated Underground Walkways', 'Intercoms', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of your exact home.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!', 'Professionally managed by GoldOller Real Estate Investments, a provider of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity.']
